trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chesterton
There were no other sightings in Chesterton on or around November 30th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI HAD JUST GOT OF WORK AROUND 8:00, WHEN WE GOT HOME WE SAW A BLUE OVAL LIGHT FLOTING THROUGH THE SKY. GOING NORTH EAST IT WAS NOT VERY HIGH THE UFO MADE NO SOUND, MOM SAID ITS JUST A PLAIN NO WAY IT WAS A FLING SAUSER.THAT WAS THE SECOND UFO I SEEN. BUT THAT TIME THERE WAS ANOTHER WITTNES.THERES NOT MUCH MOORE TO TELL BUT THATS THE TRUTH.
